testimonials.name: Nina
testimonials.text: The team was incredibly helpful during my move. They handled everything with care, and the entire process was stress-free. I’ll definitely be using their services again.

testimonials.name: Josh
testimonials.text: I had to relocate on short notice, and they managed to fit me in. The movers were punctual, professional, and got everything done faster than I expected. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Prescott
testimonials.text: I was worried about my fragile items, but they packed everything so securely. Not a single item was damaged during the move. Great experience overall.

testimonials.name: Calvin
testimonials.text: Super efficient and friendly crew! They made what could have been a stressful day really easy for us. It’s rare to find a company this reliable these days.

faqs.question: How much does your service cost?
faqs.answer: Our pricing depends on the type and size of the move. Contact us for a detailed quote.

faqs.question: What areas do you serve?
faqs.answer: We are based in Edinburgh and operate in several cities. We offer nationwide moving services.

faqs.question: Can I change my moving date after booking?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can modify your moving date as long as you notify us at least 72 hours in advance.

sections.heading: 1. Accurate Information
sections.content: Customer is responsible for providing an accurate address, including street, house number and postcode.

sections.heading: 2. Deposit Policy
sections.content: A 50% deposit is required at the time of booking to confirm the service along with a valid phone number and email address. This deposit will be refunded should the service be cancelled more than 72 hours in advance. All deposits become non-refundable if the booking is cancelled within less than 72 hours from the pick up date.

sections.heading: 3. Rescheduling
sections.content: If your plans change, ERemovals will allow you to reschedule the date whenever possible if given at least 72 hours notice.

sections.heading: 4. Inventory
sections.content: Customers are to provide an accurate list of items in advance. Please note non-listed items may be subject to additional charges on the day.

sections.heading: 5. Liability
sections.content: ERemovals is not responsible for the contents of the parcels in transit but will ensure they are transported safely and securely to their destination.

sections.heading: 6. Prohibited Items
sections.content: ERemovals will not transport chemicals, flammable or illegal substances, weapons or items that can, in any way, harm or put at risk the wellbeing of its employees.

sections.heading: 7. Code of Conduct
sections.content: ERemovals will not, in any way, tolerate harassment or abuse from any customer to its employees and will report these actions to the local authorities, if necessary.
